# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-104">Definições da entidade de tipo de informações confidenciais </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-105">A prevenção contra perda de dados (DLP) no Centro de Conformidade inclui vários tipos de informações confidenciais que estão prontos para uso em suas políticas de DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-106">Este tópico lista todos os tipos de informações confidenciais e mostra o que uma política de DLP procura ao detectar cada tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-107">Um tipo de informação confidencial é definido por um padrão que pode ser identificado por uma função ou uma expressão regular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-108">Além disso, evidências corroborativas, como palavras-chave e somas de verificação, podem ser usadas para identificar um tipo de informação confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-109">O nível de confiança e a proximidade também são usados no processo de avaliação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-110">Os tipos de informações confidenciais exigem uma destas assinaturas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-113">Número de roteamento ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-114">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-115">nove dígitos que podem estar em um padrão formatado ou não formatado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-116">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-117">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-118">quatro dígitos começando com 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 ou 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-119">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-120">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-121">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-122">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-123">Não formatado: nove dígitos consecutivos começando com 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 ou 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-124">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-125">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-126">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-127">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-128">A função Func_aba_routing localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-129">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ABA_Routing for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-130">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-131">A função Func_aba_routing localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-149">Número de identidade nacional (DNI) da Argentina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-150">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-151">Oito dígitos com ou sem pontos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-152">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-153">Oito dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-154">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-155">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-156">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-157">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-158">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-159">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-160">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-161">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-162">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-163">A expressão regular Regex_argentina_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-164">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_argentina_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-176">Número de conta bancária da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-177">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-178">de seis a dez dígitos com ou sem um número de filial de estado bancário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-179">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-180">O número da conta é de seis a dez dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-181">Número BSB da Austrália:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-182">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-183">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-184">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-185">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-186">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-187">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-188">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-189">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-190">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-191">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-192">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-193">A expressão regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-194">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-231">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-234">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-235">A função Func_australian_business_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-278">Número de carteira de motorista da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-279">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-280">nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-281">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-282">nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-283">dois dígitos ou letras (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-284">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-285">cinco dígitos ou letras (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-286">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-287">uma a duas letras opcionais (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-288">de quatro a nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-289">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-290">nove dígitos ou letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-291">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-292">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-293">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-294">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-295">A expressão regular Regex_australia_drivers_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-296">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-297">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-397">Número da conta médica da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-398">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-399">10 a 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-400">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-401">10 a 11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-402">o primeiro dígito está no intervalo de 2 a 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-403">nono dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-404">décimo dígito é o dígito do problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-405">primeiro dígito (opcional) é o número individual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-406">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-407">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-408">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-409">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-410">A função Func_australian_medical_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-411">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-412">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-415">bank account details</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-424">Número de passaporte da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-425">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-426">Uma letra seguida por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-427">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-428">Uma letra (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) seguida de sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-429">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-430">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-431">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-432">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-433">A expressão regular Regex_australia_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-434">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_passport ou Keyword_australia_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->

</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-468">Número de arquivo de imposto da Austrália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-469">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-470">oito a nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-471">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-472">de oito a nove dígitos geralmente são apresentados com espaços da seguinte maneira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-473">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-474">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-475">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-476">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-477">dois a três dígitos onde o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-478">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-479">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-480">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-481">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-482">A função Func_australian_tax_file_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-483">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number ou Keyword_number_exclusions for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-484">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-496">Número de carteira de motorista da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-497">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-498">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-498">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-499">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-500">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-500">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-501">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-502">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-502">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-503">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-504">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-505">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-505">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-506">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-506">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-633">Cartão de identidade da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-633">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-634">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-635">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-636">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-637">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-638">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-639">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-640">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-641">Uma combinação de 24 caracteres de letras, dígitos e caracteres especiais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-641">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-642">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-643">24 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-643">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-644">22 letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas), dígitos, barras in backslashes, barras ou sinais de mais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-644">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-645">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas), dígitos, barras in backslashes, barras para frente, sinais de mais ou sinais de igual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-645">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-646">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-647">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-647">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-648">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-649">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-650">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-650">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-651">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-651">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-652">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-654">identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-654">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-655">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-655">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-656">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-656">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-657">Número de passaporte da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-657">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-658">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-659">Uma letra seguida por um espaço opcional e sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-659">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-660">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-661">Uma combinação de uma letra, sete dígitos e um espaço:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-661">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-662">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-662">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-663">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-663">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-664">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-664">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-665">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-666">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-666">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-667">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-668">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-668">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-669">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-669">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-670">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-670">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-671">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-671">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-672">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-673">A expressão regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-673">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-674">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-674">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-695">Número do seguro social da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-695">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-696">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-697">10 dígitos no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-697">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-698">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-699">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-699">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-700">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-700">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-701">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-701">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-702">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-702">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-703">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-704">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-705">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-706">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-707">A função  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-707">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-708">uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-709">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-710">A função  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-736">Número de identificação fiscal da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-736">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-737">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-738">nove dígitos com hífen opcional e barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-738">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-739">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-740">nove dígitos com hífen opcional e barra para frente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-740">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-741">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-741">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-742">um hífen (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-742">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-743">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-743">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-744">uma barra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-744">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-745">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-745">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-746">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-747">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-747">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-748">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-749">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-750">A função  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-750">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-751">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-751">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-752">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-752">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-753">A função  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-753">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-776">Imposto sobre valor agregado da Áustria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-776">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-777">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-777">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-778">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-778">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-779">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-779">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-780">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-780">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-781">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-781">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-782">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-782">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-783">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-784">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-784">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-785">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-786">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-786">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-787">A ou a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-787">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-788">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-788">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-789">Espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-789">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-790">U ou u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-790">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-791">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-791">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-792">dois ou três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-792">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-793">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-793">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-794">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-794">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-795">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-795">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-796">um ou dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-796">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-797">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-798">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-799">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-800">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-801">A função Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-801">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-802">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-802">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-803">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-804">A função Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-804">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-822">Chave de auth do Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-822">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-823">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-823">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-824">A cadeia de caracteres "DocumentDb" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-824">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-825">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-825">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-826">A cadeia de caracteres "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-826">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-827">Qualquer combinação entre 3 e 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-827">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-828">Um símbolo maior que (>), um sinal de igual (=), uma aspas (") ou um apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-828">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-829">Qualquer combinação de 86 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-829">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-830">Dois sinais de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-830">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-831">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-832">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-832">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-833">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-834">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-835">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-835">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-836">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **não encontra** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-836">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-851">Cadeia de conexão de banco de dados IAAS do Azure e cadeia de conexão SQL do Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-851">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-852">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-853">A cadeia de caracteres "Servidor", "servidor" ou "fonte de dados" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo, incluindo a cadeia de caracteres "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-853">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-854">com" ou "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-854">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-855">net" ou "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-855">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-856">net" e a cadeia de caracteres "Password" ou "password" ou "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-856">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-857">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-857">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-858">a cadeia de caracteres "Servidor", "servidor" ou "fonte de dados"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-858">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-859">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-860">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-861">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-862">qualquer combinação entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-863">A cadeia de caracteres "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-863">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-864">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-864">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-865">net" ou "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-865">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-866">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-866">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-867">qualquer combinação entre 1 a 300 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-867">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-868">a cadeia de caracteres "Password", "password" ou "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-868">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-869">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-869">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-870">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-870">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-871">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-871">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-872">um ou mais caracteres que não são ponto-e-vírgula (;), aspas ("), ou apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-872">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-873">um ponto-e-vírgula (;), aspas ("), ou apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-873">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-874">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-875">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-875">No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-909">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-909">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-910">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-910">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-911">qualquer combinação de 43 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-911">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-912">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>

</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-994">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-994">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-995">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-996">A cadeia de caracteres "sig" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-996">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-997">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-997">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-998">a cadeia de caracteres "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-998">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-999">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-999">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1000">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1000">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1001">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1001">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1002">qualquer combinação entre 43 e 53 caracteres com letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos ou o sinal de porcentagem (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1002">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1003">a cadeia de caracteres "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1003">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1004">qualquer caractere que não seja letra, dígito ou sinal de porcentagem (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1004">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1005">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1006">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1007">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1008">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1009">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureSAS localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1009">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1010">Cadeia de conexão do barramento de serviço do Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1010">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1017">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1017">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1018">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1018">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1019">qualquer combinação entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1019">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1020">a cadeia de caracteres "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1020">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1021">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1021">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1022">qualquer combinação entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1022">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1023">a cadeia de caracteres "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1023">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1024">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1025">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1025">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1026">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1026">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1027">qualquer combinação de 43 caracteres com letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1027">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1028">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1028">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1029">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1029">Checksum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1033">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1033">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1034">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **não encontra** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1034">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1060">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1060">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1061">zero a dois caracteres de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1061">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
