## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1088">Chave da conta de armazenamento do Azure (genérica)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1088">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1089">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1090">Qualquer combinação de 86 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+), precedida ou seguida pelos caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1090">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1091">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1091">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1092">zero para um dos símbolos maior que (>), apóstrofo ('), sinal de igual (=), aspas (") ou sinal de número (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1092">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1093">qualquer combinação de 86 caracteres com letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, barra (/) ou sinal de mais (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1093">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1094">dois sinais de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1094">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1095">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1096">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1097">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1098">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1098">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1099">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1099">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1100">Número de carteira de motorista da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1100">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1101">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1102">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1102">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1103">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1104">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1104">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1105">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1106">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1106">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1107">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1108">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1108">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1109">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1109">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1110">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1110">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1243">Número nacional da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1243">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1244">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1244">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1245">11 dígitos mais delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1245">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1246">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1246">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1247">11 dígitos mais delimitadores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1247">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1248">seis dígitos e dois pontos opcionais no formato AA. MM.DD para a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1248">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1249">Umlimiter opcional de ponto, traço, espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1249">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1250">três dígitos sequenciais (ímpar para homens, mesmo para mulheres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1250">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1251">Umlimiter opcional de ponto, traço, espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1251">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1252">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1252">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1253">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1254">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1254">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1255">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1256">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1257">A função Func_belgium_national_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1257">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1258">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_belgium_national_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1258">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1259">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1259">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1260">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1261">A função Func_belgium_national_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1261">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1262">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1262">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1321">Número de passaporte da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1321">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1322">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1323">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1323">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1324">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1325">duas letras e seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1325">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1326">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1326">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1327">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1327">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1328">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1328">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1329">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1329">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1330">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1330">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1331">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1331">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1332">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date2` localiza data no formato DD MM AA ou uma palavra-chave de ou é `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1332">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1333">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1333">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1334">A expressão regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1334">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1335">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1335">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1359">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1359">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1360">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1360">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1361">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1361">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1362">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1362">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1363">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1363">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1364">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1364">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1365">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1365">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1366">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1367">Padrão alfanumérico de 12 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1367">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1368">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1369">Padrão alfanumérico de 12 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1369">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1370">uma letra B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1370">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1371">uma letra E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1371">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1372">um dígito 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1372">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1373">um dígito de 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1373">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1374">um ponto opcional, hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1374">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1375">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1375">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1376">um ponto opcional, hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1376">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1377">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1377">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1378">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1379">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1379">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1380">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1381">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1382">A função Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1382">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1383">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1383">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1384">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1385">A função Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1385">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1398">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1399">11 dígitos que incluem um dígito de verificação e podem ser formatados ou não formatados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1399">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1400">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1401">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1401">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1402">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1402">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1403">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1403">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1404">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1404">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1405">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1405">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1406">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1406">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1407">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1407">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1408">dois dígitos que são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1408">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1409">Não formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1409">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1410">11 dígitos em que os dois últimos dígitos são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1410">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1411">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1412">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1412">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1413">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1414">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1414">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1415">A função Func_brazil_cpf localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1415">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1416">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_brazil_cpf for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1416">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1417">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1417">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1418">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1419">A função Func_brazil_cpf localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1419">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1420">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1420">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1432">Número de entidade legal do Brasil (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1432">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1433">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1434">14 dígitos que incluem um número de registro, o número da ramificação e dígitos de verificação, além de delimitadores de seleção</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1434">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1435">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1436">14 dígitos mais delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1436">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1437">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1437">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1438">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1438">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1439">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1439">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1440">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1440">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1441">três dígitos (esses primeiros oito dígitos são o número de registro)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1441">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1442">uma barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1442">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1443">número de ramificação de quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1443">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1444">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1444">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1445">dois dígitos que são dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1445">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1446">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1447">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1447">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1448">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1449">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1449">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1450">A função Func_brazil_cnpj localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1450">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1451">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_brazil_cnpj for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1451">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1452">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1453">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1454">A função Func_brazil_cnpj localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1454">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1455">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1455">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1477">Cartão de identificação nacional (RG) do Brasil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1477">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1478">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1479">Registro Geral (formato antigo): nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1479">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1480">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (novo formato): 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1480">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1481">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1482">Registro Geral (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1482">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1483">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1483">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1484">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1484">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1485">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1485">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1486">um ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1486">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1487">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1487">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1488">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1488">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1489">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1489">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1490">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1490">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1491">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1491">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1492">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1492">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1493">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1493">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1494">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1495">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1495">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1496">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1497">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1498">A função Func_brazil_rg localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1498">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1499">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_brazil_rg for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1499">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1500">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1501">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1502">A função Func_brazil_rg localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1502">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1503">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1503">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1504">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1504">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1505">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1505">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1506">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1506">Cédula de identidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1512">RG (esta palavra-chave diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1512">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1513">RIC (esta palavra-chave diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1513">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1514">Número de carteira de motorista da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1514">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1515">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1516">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1516">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1517">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1518">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1518">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1519">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1520">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1520">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1521">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1522">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1523">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1523">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1524">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1524">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1651">Número civil uniforme da Bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1651">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1652">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1652">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1653">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1653">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1654">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1654">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1655">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1655">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1656">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1656">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1657">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1657">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1658">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1659">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1659">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1660">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1661">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1661">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1662">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1662">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1663">dois dígitos que correspondem à ordem de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1663">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1664">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo: um dígito even para o adulto e um dígito ímpar para a mulher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1664">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1665">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1665">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1666">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1667">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1667">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1668">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1669">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1669">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1670">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1670">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1671">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1671">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1672">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1673">A função  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1718">Número de passaporte bulgária</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1718">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1719">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1720">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1720">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1721">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1722">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1722">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1723">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1724">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1725">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1726">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1727">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1727">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1728">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1729">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1729">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1730">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1731">A expressão regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1731">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1732">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1733">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1733">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1734">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1734">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1735">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1735">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1752">Número da conta bancária do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1752">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1753">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1754">sete ou doze dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1754">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1755">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1756">Um número de conta bancária do Canadá tem sete ou doze dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1756">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1757">Um número de trânsito de conta bancária do Canadá tem:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1757">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1758">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1758">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1759">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1759">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1760">or de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1760">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1761">a zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1761">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1762">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1763">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1764">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1765">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1766">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1767">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1767">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1768">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1768">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1769">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1769">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1770">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1770">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1771">A expressão regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1771">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1772">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1772">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1796">Número da carteira de motorista do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1796">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1797">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1798">Varia por província</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1798">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1799">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1800">Vários padrões que abrangem Alberta, Columbia Britânica, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Escócia, Ontário, Ilha do Príncipe Eduardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1800">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1801">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1802">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1803">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1804">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1805">A função Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1805">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1806">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1806">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1807">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1807">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1943">Número do serviço de saúde do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1943">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1944">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1944">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1945">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1945">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1946">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1946">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1947">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1947">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1948">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1949">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1949">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1950">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1951">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1951">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1952">A expressão regular Regex_canada_health_service_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1952">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1953">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_canada_health_service_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1953">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1965">Número de passaporte do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1965">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1966">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1967">duas letras maiúsculas seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1967">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1968">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1968">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1969">duas letras maiúsculas seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1969">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1970">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1970">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1971">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1971">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1972">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1972">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1973">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1973">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1974">A expressão regular Regex_canada_passport_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1974">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-1975">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_canada_passport_number ou Keyword_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-1975">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2009">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2009">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2013">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2013">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2015">Pelo menos duas palavras-chave de Keyword_canada_phin ou Keyword_canada_provinces são encontradas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2015">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2048">Número do seguro social do Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2048">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2049">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2050">nove dígitos com hifens ou espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2050">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2051">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2052">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2052">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2053">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2053">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2054">um hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2054">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2055">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2055">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2056">um hífen ou espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2056">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2057">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2057">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2058">Não formatado: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2058">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2059">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2060">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2060">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2061">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2062">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2063">A função Func_canadian_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2063">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2064">Pelo menos duas de qualquer combinação do seguinte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2064">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2065">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2065">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2066">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin_collaborative for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2066">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2067">A função Func_eu_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2067">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2068">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2069">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2070">A função Func_unformatted_canadian_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2070">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2071">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2071">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2072">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2072">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2097">Número do cartão de identidade do Chile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2097">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2098">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2099">sete a oito dígitos mais delimitadores um dígito de verificação ou letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2099">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2100">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2101">sete a oito dígitos mais delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2101">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2102">de um a dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2102">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2103">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2103">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2104">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2104">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2105">um período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2105">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2106">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2106">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2107">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2107">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2108">um dígito ou letra (não faz a seleção de letras minúsculas) que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2108">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2109">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2110">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2110">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2111">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2112">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2112">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2113">A função Func_chile_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2113">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2114">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_chile_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2114">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2115">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2116">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2116">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2117">A função Func_chile_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2117">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2118">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2118">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
