## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2155">Número do cartão de identidade de residente (PRC) da China</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2155">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2156">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2157">18 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2157">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2158">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2159">18 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2159">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2160">seis dígitos que são um código de endereço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2160">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2161">oito dígitos no formato AAAAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2161">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2162">três dígitos que são um código de pedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2162">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2163">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2163">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2164">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2165">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2166">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2167">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2167">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2168">A função Func_china_resident_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2168">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2169">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_china_resident_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2169">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2170">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2171">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2171">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2172">A função Func_china_resident_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2172">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2173">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2174">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2174">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2175">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2175">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2181">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2181">居民身份证</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2183">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2183">身分證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2186">Número do cartão de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2186">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2187">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2188">14 a 16 dígitos que podem ser formatados ou não formatados (ddddd) e que devem passar no teste luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2188">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2189">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2190">Padrão muito complexo e robusto que detecta cartões de todas as principais marcas em todo o mundo, incluindo Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, vales-presentes e cartões diner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2190">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2191">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2192">Sim, a soma de verificação Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2192">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2193">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2194">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2195">A função Func_credit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2195">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2196">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2196">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2197">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_cc_verification for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2197">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2198">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_cc_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2198">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2199">A função Func_expiration_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2199">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2200">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2201">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2201">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2202">A função Func_credit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2202">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2203">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2463">Número de carteira de motorista da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2463">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2464">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2465">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2465">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2466">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2467">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2467">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2468">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2469">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2469">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2470">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2471">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2472">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2472">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2473">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2473">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2597">Número do cartão de identidade croata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2597">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2598">Essa entidade de tipo de informação sensível está incluída no tipo de informação sensível ao Número de Identificação Nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais independente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2598">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2599">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2600">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2600">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2601">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2602">nove dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2602">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2603">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2603">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2604">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2604">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2605">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2605">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2606">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2606">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2607">A função Func_croatia_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2607">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2608">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_croatia_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2608">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2639">Número de passaporte croata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2639">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2640">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2641">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2641">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2642">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2643">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2643">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2644">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2645">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2646">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2647">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2647">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2648">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2648">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2649">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2650">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2651">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2652">A expressão regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2653">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2671">Número de identificação pessoal (OIB) da Croácia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2671">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2672">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2673">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2673">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2674">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2675">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2675">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2676">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2676">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2677">dígito final é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2677">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2678">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2679">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2680">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2681">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2681">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2682">A função Func_croatia_oib_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2682">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2683">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2683">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2684">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2684">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2685">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2685">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2686">A função Func_croatia_oib_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2687">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2718">Número de licença de drivers chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2718">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2719">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2720">12 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2720">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2721">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2722">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2722">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2723">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2724">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2725">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2726">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2727">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2727">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2728">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2853">Cartão de identidade chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2853">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2854">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2854">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2855">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2855">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2856">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2856">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2857">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2857">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2858">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2858">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2859">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2859">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2860">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2861">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2861">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2862">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2863">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2863">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2864">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2865">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2865">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2866">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2867">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2867">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2868">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2868">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2869">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2869">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2870">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2870">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2872">número do cartão de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2872">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2873">número do cartão de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2873">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2874">kimlik kimliki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2874">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2875">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2875">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2876">número de ID pessoal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2876">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2878">Número de passaporte chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2878">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2879">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2880">uma letra seguida de 6 a 8 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2880">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2881">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2882">uma letra seguida de seis a oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2882">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2883">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2884">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2884">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2885">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2886">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2887">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2887">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2888">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2888">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2889">A expressão regular `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` localiza a data no formato DD/MM/AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2889">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2890">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2890">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2891">A expressão regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2891">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2892">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2892">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2921">Número de identificação fiscal de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2921">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2922">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2922">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2923">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2923">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2924">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2924">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2925">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2925">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2926">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2926">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2927">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2927">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2928">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2929">oito dígitos e uma letra no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2929">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2930">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2931">oito dígitos e uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2931">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2932">a "0" ou "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2932">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2933">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2933">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2934">uma letra (não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2934">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2935">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2936">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2936">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2937">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2938">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2939">A função  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2939">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2940">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2940">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2941">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2941">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2942">A função  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2942">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2970">Número da carteira de motorista tcheca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2970">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2971">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2972">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2972">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2973">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2974">oito letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2974">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2975">letra 'E' (não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2975">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2976">uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2976">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2977">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2977">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2978">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2978">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2979">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2980">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2981">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2982">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2983">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2983">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-2984">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-2984">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3110">Número de passaporte tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3110">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3111">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3112">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3112">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3113">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3114">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3114">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3115">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3116">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3117">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3118">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3119">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3119">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3120">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3120">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3121">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3121">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3122">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3123">A expressão regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3123">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3124">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3146">Número de identidade pessoal tcheco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3146">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3147">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3148">nove dígitos com barra (formato antigo) opcional dez dígitos com barra (novo formato) opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3148">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3149">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3150">nove dígitos (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3150">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3151">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3151">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3152">uma barra inativa opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3152">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3153">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3153">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3154">dez dígitos (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3154">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3155">seis dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3155">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3156">uma barra inativa opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3156">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3157">quatro dígitos onde o último dígito é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3157">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3158">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3159">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3160">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3161">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3162">A função Func_czech_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3162">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3163">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_czech_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3163">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3164">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3165">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3166">A função Func_czech_id_card_new_format localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3166">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3167">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3214">Número de carteira de motorista da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3214">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3215">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3216">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3216">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3217">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3218">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3218">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3219">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3220">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3220">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3221">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3222">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3223">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3223">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3224">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3354">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3355">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3356">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3357">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3357">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3358">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3359">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date2` localiza a data no formato DD MM AA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3359">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3360">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3360">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3361">A expressão regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3361">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3362">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3382">Número de identificação pessoal da Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3382">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3383">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3384">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3384">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3385">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3386">dez dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3386">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3387">seis dígitos no formato DDMMYY que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3387">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3388">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3388">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3389">quatro dígitos onde o dígito final é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3389">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3390">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3391">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3391">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3392">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3393">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3394">A expressão regular Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3394">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3395">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_denmark_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3395">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3396">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3396">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3397">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3397">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3398">A expressão regular Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3398">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3399">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3399">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3471">Número da AGÊNCIA DEA (Agência de Imposição de Entortala)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3471">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3472">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3473">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3473">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3474">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3475">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3475">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3476">uma letra (não sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas) desse conjunto de letras possíveis: abcdefghjklmnprstux, que é um código de registro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3476">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3477">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas), que é a primeira letra do sobrenome ou dígito do registro '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3477">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3478">sete dígitos, o último deles é o dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3478">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3479">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3480">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3481">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3482">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3483">A função Func_dea_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3483">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3484">Uma palavra-chave `Keyword_dea_number` de onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3484">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3485">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3485">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3486">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3486">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3487">A função Func_dea_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3487">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3488">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3489">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3491">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3491">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3492">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3492">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3493">administração de imposição de dependentes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3493">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3494">drug enforcement agency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3494">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3495">Número de carteira de motorista da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3495">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3496">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3497">duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3497">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3498">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3499">duas letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3499">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3500">as letras "ET" (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3500">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3501">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3501">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3502">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3503">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3504">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3505">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3506">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3506">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3507">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
