## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3633">Código de Identificação Pessoal da Estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3633">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3634">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3635">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3636">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3637">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3638">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3639">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3640">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3641">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3641">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3642">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3643">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3643">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3644">um dígito que corresponde ao sexo e ao gênero de nascimento (número ímpar do sexo, número par de mulheres; 1-2: décimo-nove; 3-4: 20º aniversário; 5-6: 21 do séc)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3644">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3645">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3645">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3646">três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série separando pessoas na mesma data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3646">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3647">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3647">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3648">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3649">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3649">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3650">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3651">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3651">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3652">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3652">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3653">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3653">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3654">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3655">A função  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3655">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3688">Número de passaporte estônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3688">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3689">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3690">uma letra seguida por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3690">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3691">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3692">uma letra seguida por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3692">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3693">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3694">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3694">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3695">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3696">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3697">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3697">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3698">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3698">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3699">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3699">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3700">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3701">A expressão regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3701">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3702">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3720">Número de cartão de débito da UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3720">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3721">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3722">16 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3722">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3723">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3724">Padrão muito complexo e robusto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3724">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3725">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3726">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3727">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3728">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3729">A função Func_eu_debit_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3729">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3730">Pelo menos uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3731">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_eu_debit_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3731">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3732">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3732">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3733">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_security_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3733">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3734">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3734">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3735">A função Func_expiration_date encontra uma data no formato de data à direita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3735">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-3736">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-3736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4182">Número de carteira de motorista da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4182">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4183">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4184">dez dígitos e letras contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4184">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4185">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4186">dez dígitos e letras contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4186">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4187">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4187">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4188">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4188">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4189">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4189">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4190">um dígito ou letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4190">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4191">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4192">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4192">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4193">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4194">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4194">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4195">A expressão regular  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4195">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4196">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4327">Número do seguro de saúde europeu da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4327">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4328">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4328">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4329">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4329">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4330">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4330">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4331">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4331">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4332">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4332">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4333">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4333">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4334">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4335">Número de 20 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4335">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4336">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4337">Número de 20 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4337">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4338">dez dígitos - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4338">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4339">um espaço opcional ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4339">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4340">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4340">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4341">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4342">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4343">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4344">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4345">A regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4345">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4346">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4346">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4364">ID nacional da Finlândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4364">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4365">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4366">seis dígitos mais um caractere indicando um centenário mais três dígitos mais um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4366">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4367">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4368">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4368">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4369">seis dígitos no formato DDMMYY que são uma data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4369">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4370">Marcador de centenário ('-', '+' ou 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4370">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4371">número de identificação pessoal de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4371">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4372">um dígito ou letra (sem maiúsculas e minúsculas), que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4372">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4373">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4374">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4374">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4375">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4376">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4376">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4377">a função Func_finnish_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4377">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4378">uma palavra-chave Keyword_finnish_national_id for encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4378">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4379">as passagens de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4379">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4380">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4380">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4381">a função Func_finnish_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4381">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4382">as passagens de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4382">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4431">Número de passaporte finlandês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4431">Finland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4432">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4432">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4433">combinação de nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4433">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4434">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4434">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4435">combinação de nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4435">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4436">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4436">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4437">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4437">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4438">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4439">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4439">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4440">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4441">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4442">A expressão regular Regex_finland_passport_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4442">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4443">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_eu_passport_number_common ou Keyword_finland_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4443">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4464">Número de carteira de motorista da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4464">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4465">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4466">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4466">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4467">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4468">12 dígitos com a validação para descontar padrões similares, como números de telefone em francês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4468">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4469">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4470">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4471">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4472">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4473">a função Func_french_drivers_license localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4473">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4474">uma palavra-chave Keyword_french_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4474">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4601">Número do seguro saúde da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4601">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4602">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4602">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4603">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4603">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4604">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4604">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4605">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4605">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4606">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4606">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4607">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4607">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4608">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4609">Número de 21 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4609">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4610">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4611">Número de 21 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4611">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4612">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4612">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4613">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4613">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4614">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4614">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4615">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4615">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4616">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4616">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4617">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4618">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4619">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4620">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4621">a regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4621">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4622">uma palavra-chave Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4622">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4623">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4623">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4624">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4624">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4625">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4625">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4626">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4626">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4627">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4627">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4628">Carteira nacional de identidade francesa (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4628">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4629">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4630">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4630">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4631">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4632">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4632">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4633">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4634">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4634">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4635">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4636">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4636">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4637">A expressão regular Regex_france_cni localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4637">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4638">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4638">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4652">Número de passaporte francês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4652">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4653">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está disponível no tipo de informação sensível ao Número de Passaporte da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais independente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4653">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4654">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4655">nove dígitos e letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4655">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4656">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4657">nove dígitos e letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4657">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4658">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4658">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4659">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4659">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4660">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4660">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4661">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4662">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4662">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4663">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4664">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4665">A função Func_fr_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4665">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4666">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4666">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4687">Número de seguro social da França (INSEE) ou identificação equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4687">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4688">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no Número de Seguridade Social da UE e no tipo de informação confidenciais de ID Equivalente e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais autônomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4688">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4689">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4690">15 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4690">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4691">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4692">Deve corresponder a um dos dois padrões:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4692">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4693">13 dígitos seguidos por um espaço seguido por dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4693">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4694">ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4694">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4695">15 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4695">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4696">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4697">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4698">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4699">Uma política de DLP tem 95% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4699">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4700">A função Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4700">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4701">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_fr_insee for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4701">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4702">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4703">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4703">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4704">A função Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4704">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4705">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_fr_insee for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4705">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4706">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4706">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4732">Número de identificação de imposto da França</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4732">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4733">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4734">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4734">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4735">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4736">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4736">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4737">Um dígito que deve ser 0, 1, 2 ou 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4737">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4738">1 dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4738">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4739">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4739">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4740">2 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4740">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4741">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4741">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4742">3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4742">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4743">Um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4743">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4744">3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4744">3 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4748">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4748">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4749">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4750">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4750">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4751">A função  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4751">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4752">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4752">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4753">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4754">A função  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4795">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4795">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4800">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4801">A função Func_france_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4815">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4816">combinação de 11 dígitos e letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4816">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4817">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4818">11 dígitos e letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4818">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4820">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4820">two digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4823">um dígito ou letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4823">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4824">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4824">Checksum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4828">A função Func_german_drivers_license localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4828">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4829">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_german_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4829">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4830">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4830">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4979">Número do cartão de identidade da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4979">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4980">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4981">desde 1º de novembro de 2010: nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4981">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4982">de 1º de abril de 1987 até 31 de outubro de 2010: 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4982">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4983">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4984">desde 1º de novembro de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4984">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4985">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4985">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4986">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4986">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4987">de 1º de abril de 1987 até 31 de outubro de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4987">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4988">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4988">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4989">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4990">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4990">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4991">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4992">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4992">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4993">A expressão regular Regex_germany_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4993">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4994">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_germany_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4994">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4995">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4995">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-4999">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-4999">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5000">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5000">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5003">identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5003">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5004">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5004">id-nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5006">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5006">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5007">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5007">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5008">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5008">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5009">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5009">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5010">Número de passaporte da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5010">Germany passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5011">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5012">dez dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5012">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5013">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5014">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5014">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5015">primeiro caractere é um dígito ou uma letra desse conjunto (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5015">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5016">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5016">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5017">cinco dígitos ou letras desse conjunto (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5017">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5018">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5018">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5019">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5020">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5020">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5021">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5022">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5022">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5023">A função Func_german_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5023">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5024">Uma palavra-chave `Keyword_german_passport` de `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5024">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5025">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5025">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5026">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5027">A função Func_german_passport_data localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5027">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5028">Uma palavra-chave `Keyword_german_passport` de `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5028">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5029">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5052">Número de identificação fiscal da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5052">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5053">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5054">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5054">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5055">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5056">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5056">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5057">Dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5057">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5058">Um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5058">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5059">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5059">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5060">Um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5060">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5061">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5061">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5062">Um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5062">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5063">Dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5063">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5064">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5064">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5065">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5066">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5066">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5067">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5068">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5069">A função  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5069">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5070">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5070">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5071">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5072">A função  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5072">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5073">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5073">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5074">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5074">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5075">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5075">identifikationsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5098">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Alemanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5098">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5099">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5099">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5100">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5100">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5101">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5101">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5102">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5102">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5103">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5103">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5104">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5104">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5105">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5106">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5106">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5107">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5108">Padrão alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5108">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5109">uma letra D ou d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5109">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5110">uma letra E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5110">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5111">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5111">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5112">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5112">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5113">um espaço opcional ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5113">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5114">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5114">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5115">um espaço opcional ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5115">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5116">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5116">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5117">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5117">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5118">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5118">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5119">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5119">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5120">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5120">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5121">A função Func_germany_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5121">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5122">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5122">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5123">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5123">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5124">A função Func_germany_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5124">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5134">Número de carteira de motorista da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5134">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5135">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5136">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5136">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5137">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5138">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5138">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5139">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5140">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5141">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5142">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5143">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5144">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
