## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5270">Cartão de identificação nacional da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5270">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5271">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5272">Combinação de 7 a 8 letras e números mais um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5272">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5273">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5274">Sete letras e números (formato antigo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5274">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5275">Uma letra (qualquer letra do alfabeto grego) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5275">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5276">Um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5276">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5277">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5277">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5278">Oito letras e números (novo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5278">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5279">Duas letras cujos caracteres maiúsculos ocorre em alfabetos latino e grego (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5279">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5280">Um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5280">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5281">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5281">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5282">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5283">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5284">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5285">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5285">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5286">A expressão regular Regex_greece_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5286">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5287">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_greece_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5287">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5288">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5288">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5289">A expressão regular Regex_greece_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5289">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5294">cartão de ID pessoal grego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5294">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5295">greek police id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5295">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5296">cartão de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5296">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5300">Número de passaporte da Grécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5300">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5301">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5302">Duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5302">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5303">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5304">Duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5304">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5305">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5306">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5306">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5307">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5308">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5308">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5309">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5309">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5310">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5311">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (Exemplo - 28 de agosto de 19) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5311">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5312">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5313">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5313">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5314">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5314">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5331">Número de Seguro Social da Grécia (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5331">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5332">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5333">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5334">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5335">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5336">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5337">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5338">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5339">Dígitos iniciais sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5339">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5340">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5340">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5341">6 dígitos como data de nascimento AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5341">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5342">4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5342">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5343">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5343">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5344">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5345">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5345">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5346">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5347">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5347">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5348">A função  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5348">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5349">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5349">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5350">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5350">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5351">A função  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5351">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5363">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5364">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5367">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5368">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5369">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5370">Nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5370">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5371">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5372">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5372">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5373">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5373">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5375">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5376">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5377">A expressão regular  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5377">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5378">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5378">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5407">Número do cartão de identidade de Hong Kong (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5407">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5408">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5409">Combinação de 8 a 9 letras e números mais parênteses opcionais ao redor do caractere final</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5409">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5410">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5411">Combinação de 8 a 9 letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5411">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5412">1 a 2 letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5412">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5413">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5413">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5414">O caractere final (qualquer dígito ou a letra A), que é o dígito de verificação e é opcionalmente colocado entre parênteses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5414">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5415">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5416">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5417">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5418">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5419">A função Func_hong_kong_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5419">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5420">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_hong_kong_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5420">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5421">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5421">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5422">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5422">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5423">A função Func_hong_kong_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5423">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5424">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5424">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5464">Número de carteira de motorista hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5464">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5465">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5466">Duas letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5466">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5467">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5468">Duas letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5468">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5469">Duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5469">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5470">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5470">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5471">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5472">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5473">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5474">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5475">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5476">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5601">Número de identificação pessoal hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5601">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5602">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5602">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5603">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5603">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5604">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5604">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5605">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5605">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5606">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5606">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5607">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5607">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5608">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5609">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5609">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5610">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5611">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5611">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5612">Um dígito que corresponde ao sexo (1 adulto, 2 homens, 2 mulheres, outros números também são possíveis para cidadãos que já foram homens antes de 1900 ou cidadãos com dupla cidadania)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5612">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5613">Seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5613">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5614">Três dígitos que correspondem a um número de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5614">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5615">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5615">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5616">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5617">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5617">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5618">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5619">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5619">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5620">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5620">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5621">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5621">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5622">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5623">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5623">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5634">Número de passaporte hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5634">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5635">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5636">Duas letras seguidas por seis ou sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5636">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5637">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5638">Duas letras seguidas por seis ou sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5638">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5639">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5640">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5640">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5641">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5642">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5643">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5643">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5644">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5644">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5645">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (Exemplo - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5645">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5646">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5647">A expressão regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5647">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5648">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5648">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5665">Número de seguridade social (TAD) da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5665">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5666">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5667">Nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5667">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5668">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5668">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5669">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5669">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5670">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5671">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5671">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5672">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5673">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5674">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5674">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5675">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5675">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5676">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5676">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5677">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5677">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5697">Número de identificação fiscal da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5697">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5698">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5698">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5699">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5699">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5700">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5700">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5701">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5701">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5702">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5702">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5703">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5703">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5704">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5705">Dez dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5705">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5706">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5707">Dez dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5707">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5708">Um dígito que deve ser "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5708">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5709">Oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5709">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5710">Um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5711">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5712">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5713">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5714">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5715">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5716">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5717">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5718">A função  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5719">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5719">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5720">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5720">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5721">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5721">adóazonosító szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5744">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor da Hungria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5744">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5745">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5745">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5746">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5746">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5747">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5747">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5748">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5748">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5749">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5749">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5750">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5750">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5751">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5752">Padrão alfanumérico de 10 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5752">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5753">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5754">Padrão alfanumérico de 10 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5754">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5755">2 letras - HU ou hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5755">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5756">espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5756">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5757">8 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5757">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5758">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5759">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5760">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5761">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5762">A função Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5762">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5763">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5763">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5764">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5765">A função Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5765">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5779">Número de conta permanente da Índia (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5779">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5780">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5781">10 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5781">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5782">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5783">10 letras ou dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5783">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5784">Três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5784">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5785">Uma letra em C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (não faz a sensibilidade a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5785">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5786">Uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5786">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5787">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5787">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5788">Uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5788">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5789">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5790">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5790">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5791">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5792">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5793">A expressão regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5793">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5794">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_india_permanent_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5794">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5795">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5795">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5796">A expressão regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5796">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5801">Número de identificação exclusiva da Índia (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5801">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5802">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5803">12 dígitos contendo espaços opcionais ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5803">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5804">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5805">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5805">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5806">Um dígito que não é 0 ou 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5806">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5807">Três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5807">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5808">Um espaço ou um traço opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5808">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5809">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5809">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5810">Um espaço ou um traço opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5810">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5811">O dígito final que é o dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5811">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5812">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5813">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5813">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5814">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5815">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5816">A função Func_india_aadhaar localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5816">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5817">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_india_aadhar for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5817">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5818">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5818">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5819">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5820">A função Func_india_aadhaar localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5820">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5821">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5822">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5822">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5830">Número do cartão de identidade da Indonésia (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5830">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5831">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5832">16 dígitos contendo pontos opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5832">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5833">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5834">16 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5834">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5835">Código de província de dois dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5835">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5836">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5836">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5837">Código de dois dígitos da regência ou da cidade </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5837">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5838">Código de dois dígitos do subdistrito </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5838">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5839">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5839">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5840">Seis dígitos no formato DDMMAA que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5840">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5841">Um ponto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5841">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5842">Quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5842">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5843">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5844">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5845">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5846">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5846">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5847">A expressão regular Regex_indonesia_id_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5847">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5848">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_indonesia_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5848">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5854">Número internacional de conta bancária (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5854">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5855">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5856">Código do país (duas letras) mais dígitos de verificação (dois dígitos) mais número bban (até 30 caracteres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5856">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5857">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5858">O padrão deve incluir todos os seguintes itens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5858">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5859">Código do país de duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5859">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5860">Dois dígitos de verificação (seguidos de um espaço opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5860">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5861">1 a 7 grupos de quatro letras ou dígitos (podem ser separados por espaços)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5861">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5862">1 a 3 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5862">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5863">O formato para cada país é ligeiramente diferente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5863">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5864">O tipo de informação confidenciais do IBAN abrange esses 60 países:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5864">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5866">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5867">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5868">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5869">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5870">A função Func_iban localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5870">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5871">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5871">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5887">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5887">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5888">Qualquer termo do dicionário Dictionary_icd_10_updated palavra-chave, que é baseado na Classificação Internacional de Pacientes, Décimo Revisão, Modificação Genética [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5888">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5889">Esse tipo procura apenas o termo, não os códigos de seguro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5889">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5910">Endereço IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5910">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5911">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5911">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5912">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5912">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5913">Padrão complexo que é responsável por versões formatadas (pontos) e não formatadas (sem pontos) dos endereços IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5913">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5914">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5914">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5915">Padrão complexo que é responsável por números IPv6 formatados (que incluem dois pontos)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5915">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5916">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5916">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5917">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5918">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5919">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5920">Para IPv6, uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5920">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5921">A expressão regular Regex_ipv6_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5921">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5922">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5922">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5923">Para IPv4, uma política de DLP tem 95% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5923">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5924">A expressão regular Regex_ipv4_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5924">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5925">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5925">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5926">Para IPv6, uma política de DLP tem 95% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5926">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5927">A expressão regular Regex_ipv6_address localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5927">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5928">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_ipaddress for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5928">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5932">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5932">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5933">endereços ip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5933">ip addresses</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5936">Número de carteira de motorista da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5936">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5937">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5938">Seis dígitos seguidos por quatro letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5938">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5939">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5940">Seis dígitos e quatro letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5940">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5941">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5941">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5942">Quatro letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5942">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5943">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5944">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5944">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5945">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5946">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5947">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5947">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-5948">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-5948">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
