## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6072">Número de passaporte da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6072">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6073">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6074">Duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6074">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6075">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6076">Duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6076">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6077">Dois dígitos ou letras (não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6077">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6078">Sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6078">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6079">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6079">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6080">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6080">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6081">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6081">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6082">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6082">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6083">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6083">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6084">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6084">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6085">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAY (Exemplo - 01 BEA/MAIO de 1988) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6085">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6086">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6086">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6087">A expressão regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6088">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6112">Número de serviço público pessoal (PPS) da Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6112">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6113">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6114">Formato antigo (até 31 de dezembro de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6114">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6115">sete dígitos seguidos de 1 a 2 letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6115">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6116">Novo formato (1º de janeiro de 2013 e depois):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6116">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6117">sete dígitos seguidos por duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6117">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6118">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6119">Formato antigo (até 31 de dezembro de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6119">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6120">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6120">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6121">uma a duas letras (não sensitivo entre maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6121">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6122">Novo formato (1º de janeiro de 2013 e depois):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6122">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6123">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6123">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6124">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas) que é um dígito de verificação alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6124">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6125">Uma letra opcional no intervalo A-I ou "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6125">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6126">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6127">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6128">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6129">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6129">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6130">A função Func_ireland_pps localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6130">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6131">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6131">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6132">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6133">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6133">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6134">A função Func_ireland_pps localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6134">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />

        </Pattern>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6180">Número da conta bancária de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6180">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6181">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6182">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6182">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6183">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6184">Formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6184">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6185">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6185">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6186">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6186">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6187">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6187">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6188">um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6188">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6189">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6189">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6190">Não formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6190">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6191">13 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6191">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6192">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6193">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6193">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6194">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6195">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6196">A expressão regular Regex_israel_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6196">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6197">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_israel_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6197">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6204">Número de identificação nacional de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6204">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6205">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6206">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6206">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6207">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6208">nove dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6208">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6209">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6210">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6210">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6211">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6212">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6213">A função Func_israeli_national_id_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6213">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6214">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_Israel_National_ID for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6214">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6215">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6234">Número de carteira de motorista da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6234">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6235">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6236">uma combinação de 10 letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6236">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6237">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6238">uma combinação de 10 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6238">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6239">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6239">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6240">a letra "A" ou "V" (não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6240">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6241">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6241">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6242">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6242">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6243">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6244">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6244">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6245">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6246">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6247">A expressão regular Regex_italy_drivers_license_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6247">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6248">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6248">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6251">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6251">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6252">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6252">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6253">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6253">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6254">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6254">patenti di guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6256">Código fiscal da Itália</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6256">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6257">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6257">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6258">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6258">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6259">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6259">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6260">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6260">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6261">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6261">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6262">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6262">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6263">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6264">uma combinação de 16 caracteres de letras e dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6264">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6265">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6266">Uma combinação de 16 caracteres de letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6266">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6267">três letras que correspondem às três primeiras consoantes no nome da família</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6267">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6268">três letras que correspondem à primeira, terceira e quarta consoantes no primeiro nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6268">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6269">dois dígitos que correspondem aos últimos dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6269">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6270">uma letra que corresponde à letra do mês de nascimento — as letras são usadas em ordem alfabética, mas somente as letras A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T são usadas (portanto, janeiro é A e outubro é R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6270">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6271">dois dígitos que correspondem ao dia do mês de nascimento— para diferenciar entre os sexos, 40 é adicionado ao dia de nascimento da mulher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6271">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6272">quatro dígitos que corresponde ao código de área específico da situação em que a pessoa aconteceu (códigos de país/região são usados para países estrangeiros)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6272">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6273">um dígito de paridade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6273">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6274">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6275">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6276">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6277">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6278">A função  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6278">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6279">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6279">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6280">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6281">A função  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6281">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6316">Número de passaporte italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6316">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6317">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6318">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6318">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6319">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6320">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6320">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6321">dois dígitos ou letras (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6321">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6322">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6322">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6323">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6324">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6324">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6325">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6326">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6327">A expressão regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6327">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6328">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6328">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6329">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (Exemplo - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) ou uma palavra-chave de onde `Keywords_eu_passport_date` foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6329">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6330">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6331">A expressão regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6331">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6332">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6333">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6333">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6356">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6356">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6357">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6357">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6358">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6358">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6359">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6359">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6360">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6360">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6361">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6361">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6362">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6362">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6363">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6363">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6364">Padrão alfanumérico de 13 caracteres com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6364">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6365">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6365">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6366">Padrão alfanumérico de 13 caracteres com delimitadores opcionais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6366">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6367">I ou i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6367">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6368">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6368">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6369">espaço opcional, ponto, hífen ou vírgula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6369">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6370">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6370">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6371">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6372">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6373">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6374">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6375">A função Func_italy_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6375">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6376">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6376">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6377">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6377">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6378">A função Func_italy_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6378">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6386">Número de conta bancária do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6386">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6387">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6388">sete ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6388">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6389">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6390">número da conta bancária:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6390">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6391">sete ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6391">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6392">código de ramificação de conta bancária:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6392">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6393">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6393">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6394">um espaço ou traço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6394">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6395">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6395">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6396">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6397">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6398">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6399">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6400">A função Func_jp_bank_account localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6400">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6401">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6401">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6402">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6402">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6403">A função Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6403">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6404">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6404">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6405">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6406">A função Func_jp_bank_account localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6406">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6407">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_bank_account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6407">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6455">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6456">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6456">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6459">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6459">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6461">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6462">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6463">A função Func_jp_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6463">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6464">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6464">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml

    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6502">Meu Número do Japão - Corporativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6502">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6503">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6504">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6505">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6506">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6507">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6508">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6509">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6510">Número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6511">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6512">Número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6513">um dígito de um a nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6513">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6514">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6514">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6515">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6516">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6517">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6518">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6519">A função Func_japanese_my_number_corporate localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6519">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6520">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6520">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6521">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6521">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6522">A função Func_japanese_my_number_corporate localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6522">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6549">um espaço opcional, ponto ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6549">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6550">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6550">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6551">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6552">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6553">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6554">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6555">A função Func_japanese_my_number_personal localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6555">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6556">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6556">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6557">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6557">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6558">A função Func_japanese_my_number_personal localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6558">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6571">Número de passaporte do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6571">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6572">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6572">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6573">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6573">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6574">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6574">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6575">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) seguidas de sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6575">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6577">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6577">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6578">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6579">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6580">A função Func_jp_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6580">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6581">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6581">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6598">Número do cartão de residência do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6598">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6599">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6600">12 letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6600">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6601">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6602">12 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6602">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6603">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6603">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6604">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6604">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6605">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6605">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6606">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6607">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6608">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6609">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6609">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6610">A expressão regular Regex_jp_residence_card_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6610">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6611">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_jp_residence_card_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6620">Número de registro de residente do Japão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6620">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6623">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6623">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6627">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6627">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6628">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6629">A função Func_jp_resident_registration_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6629">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6643">Número do seguro social japonês (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6643">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6644">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6645">7 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6645">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6646">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6647">7 a 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6647">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6648">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6648">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6649">um hífen (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6649">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6652">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6653">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6653">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6654">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6655">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6656">A função Func_jp_sin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6656">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6657">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6657">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6658">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6659">A função Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6659">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6660">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_jp_sin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6660">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6681">Número de carteira de motorista da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6681">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6682">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6683">três letras seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6683">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6684">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6685">três letras e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6685">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6686">três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6686">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6687">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6687">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6688">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6689">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6689">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6690">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6691">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6692">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6692">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6693">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6693">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6818">Código pessoal da Letônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6818">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6819">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6820">11 dígitos e um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6820">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6821">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6822">Formato antigo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6822">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6823">11 dígitos e um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6823">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6824">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6824">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6825">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6825">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6826">um dígito que corresponde ao centenário de nascimento ("0" para o aniversário do 19o, "1" para o 20º ano e "2" para o 21º dia)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6826">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6827">quatro dígitos, gerados aleatoriamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6827">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6828">Novo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6828">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6829">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6829">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6830">Dois dígitos "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6830">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6831">Nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6831">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6832">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6833">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6834">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6835">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6835">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6836">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6836">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6837">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6837">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6838">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6838">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6839">A função  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6839">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6902">Número de passaporte letão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6902">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6903">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6904">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6904">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6905">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6906">duas letras ou dígitos seguidos por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6906">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6907">dois dígitos ou letras (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6907">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6908">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6908">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6909">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6910">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6911">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6912">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6913">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6913">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6914">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6915">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6915">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6916">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6917">A expressão regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6917">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6918">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6918">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6941">Número de carteira de motorista da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6941">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6942">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6943">oito dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6943">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6944">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6945">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6945">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6946">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6947">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6948">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6949">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6950">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6950">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-6951">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-6951">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
