## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7076">Código pessoal da Lituânia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7076">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7077">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7077">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7078">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7078">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7079">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7079">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7080">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7080">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7081">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7081">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7082">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7082">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7083">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7084">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7084">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7085">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7086">11 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7086">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7087">um dígito (1 a 6) que corresponde ao gênero e ao gênero de nascimento da pessoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7087">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7088">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7088">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7089">três dígitos que correspondem ao número de série da data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7089">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7090">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7090">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7091">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7092">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7093">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7094">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7095">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7095">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7096">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7096">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7097">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7098">A função  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7098">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7133">Número de passaporte lituano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7133">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7134">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7135">oito dígitos ou letras sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7135">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7136">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7136">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7137">oito dígitos ou letras (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7137">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7138">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7139">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7139">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7140">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7141">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7142">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7142">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7143">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7144">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` localiza a data no formato DD MM AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7144">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7145">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7146">A expressão regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7147">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7167">Número de carteira de motorista de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7167">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7168">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7169">seis dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7170">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7171">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7172">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7173">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7174">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7175">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7176">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7177">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7301">Número de identificação nacional (pessoas físicas) de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7301">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7302">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7303">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7304">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7305">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7306">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7307">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7308">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7309">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7309">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7310">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7311">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7311">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7312">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7312">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7313">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7313">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7314">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7315">sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7315">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7316">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7317">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7318">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7318">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7319">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7319">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7320">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7321">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7321">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7344">Número de passaporte de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7344">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7345">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7346">oito dígitos ou letras sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7346">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7347">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7348">oito dígitos ou letras (não são sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7348">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7349">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7350">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7350">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7351">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7352">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7352">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7353">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7353">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7354">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7354">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7355">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` localiza a data no formato DD MM AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7355">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7356">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7357">A expressão regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7358">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7390">Número de identificação nacional de Luxemburgo (pessoas não naturais)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7390">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7391">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7392">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7392">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7393">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7394">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7394">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7395">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7395">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7396">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7396">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7397">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7397">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7398">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7398">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7399">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7399">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7400">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7400">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7401">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7401">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7402">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7402">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7403">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7404">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7405">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7406">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7407">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7407">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7408">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7408">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7409">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7410">A função  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7410">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7427">steier nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7427">steier nummer</span></span>

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7450">Número do cartão de identificação da Malásia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7450">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7451">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7452">12 dígitos contendo hifens opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7452">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7453">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7454">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7454">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7455">seis dígitos no formato AAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7455">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7456">um travessão (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7456">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7457">código de local de nascimento de duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7457">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7458">um travessão (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7458">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7459">três dígitos aleatórios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7459">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7460">código de gênero de um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7460">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7461">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7462">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7462">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7463">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7464">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7464">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7465">A expressão regular Regex_malaysia_id_card_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7465">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7466">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7466">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7493">Número de carteira de motorista de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7493">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7494">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7495">Combinação de dois caracteres e seis dígitos no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7495">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7496">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7497">combinação de dois caracteres e seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7497">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7498">dois caracteres (dígitos ou letras, não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7498">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7499">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7499">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7500">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7501">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7501">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7502">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7502">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7503">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7504">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7504">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7505">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7506">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7507">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7507">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7508">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7508">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7632">Número do cartão de identidade de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7632">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7633">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7633">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7634">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7634">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7635">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7635">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7636">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7636">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7637">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7637">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7638">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7638">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7639">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7640">sete dígitos seguidos por uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7640">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7641">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7642">sete dígitos seguidos por uma letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7642">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7643">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7644">uma letra em "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (não maiúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7644">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7645">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7646">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7646">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7647">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7648">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7649">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7649">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7650">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7650">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7651">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7651">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7652">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7652">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7669">Número de passaporte de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7669">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7670">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7671">sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7671">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7672">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7673">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7673">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7674">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7675">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7675">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7676">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7677">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7678">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7678">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7679">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7679">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7680">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` de onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7680">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7681">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7681">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7682">A expressão regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7682">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7683">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7683">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7703">Número de identificação fiscal de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7703">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7704">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7705">Para nacionais malteses:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7705">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7706">sete dígitos e uma letra no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7706">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7707">Entidades nacionais e maltesas não maltesas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7707">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7708">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7708">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7709">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7710">Nacionais maltesos: sete dígitos e uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7710">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7711">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7711">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7712">uma letra (não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7712">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7713">Entidades nacionais e maltesas não maltesas: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7713">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7714">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7714">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7715">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7716">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7716">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7717">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7718">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7719">A regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7719">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7720">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7720">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7721">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7721">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7722">A regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7722">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7755">Número do serviço do cidadão (BSN) da Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7755">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7756">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7757">oito a nove dígitos contendo espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7757">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7758">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7759">oito a nove dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7759">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7760">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7760">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7761">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7761">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7762">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7762">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7763">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7763">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7764">dois-três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7764">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7765">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7766">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7767">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7768">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7768">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7769">A função Func_netherlands_bsn localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7769">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7770">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_netherlands_bsn for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7770">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7771">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7795">Número de carteira de motorista dos Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7795">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7796">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7797">dez dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7797">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7798">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7799">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7799">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7800">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7801">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7802">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7803">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7804">A expressão regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7804">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7805">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7933">Número de passaporte dos Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7933">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7934">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7935">nove letras ou dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7935">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7936">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7937">nove letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7937">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7938">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7939">não se aplica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7939">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7940">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7941">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7941">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7942">A expressão regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7942">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7943">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7944">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAY (Exemplo - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7944">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7945">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7946">A expressão regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7946">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7947">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7965">Número de identificação fiscal dos Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7965">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7966">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7966">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7967">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7967">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7968">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7968">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7969">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7969">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7970">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7970">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7971">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7971">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7972">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7973">nove dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7973">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7974">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7975">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7975">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7976">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7977">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7978">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7979">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7980">A função  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7980">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7981">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7981">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7982">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7982">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-7983">A função  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-7983">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8021">Número de imposto adicionado ao valor dos Países Baixos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8021">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8022">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8022">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8023">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8023">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8024">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8024">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8025">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8025">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8026">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8026">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8027">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8027">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8028">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8029">Padrão alfanumérico de 14 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8029">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8030">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8030">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8031">Padrão alfanumérico de 14 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8031">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8032">N ou n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8032">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8033">L ou l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8033">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8034">espaço opcional, ponto ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8034">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8035">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8035">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8036">espaço opcional, ponto ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8036">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8037">B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8037">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8038">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8038">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8039">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8040">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8040">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8041">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8042">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8042">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8043">A função Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8043">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8044">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8044">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8045">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8046">A função Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8046">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8056">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8056">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8057">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8057">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8058">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8058">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8062">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8063">Padrão de 14 a 16 dígitos com olimiter opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8063">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8064">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8065">Padrão de 14 a 16 dígitos com o delimiter opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8065">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8066">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8066">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8067">um hífen ou espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8067">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8068">de três a quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8068">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8069">um hífen ou espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8069">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8070">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8070">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8071">um hífen ou espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8071">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8072">de dois a três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8072">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8073">um hífen ou espaço de opções</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8073">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8074">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8075">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8076">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8077">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8077">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8078">A função Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8078">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8079">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8079">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8080">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8080">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8081">A função Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8081">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8096">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8096">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8098">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8099">padrão alfanumérico de oito caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8099">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8103">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8104">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8105">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8105">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8106">A função Func_newzealand_driver_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8106">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8107">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8107">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8108">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8108">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8109">A função Func_newzealand_driver_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8109">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8177">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8177">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8183">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8183">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8185">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8186">oito ou nove dígitos com delimitadores opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8186">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8187">dois ou três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8187">two or three digits</span></span>
