- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8189">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8189">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8190">um espaço opcional ou hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8190">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8193">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8193">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8194">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8195">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8196">A função Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8196">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8197">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8197">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8198">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8199">A função Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8199">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8210">três letras, um espaço (opcional) e quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8210">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8211">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8211">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8212">três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas), exceto 'I' e 'O'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8212">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8213">um espaço (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8213">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8214">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8214">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8215">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8216">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8216">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8217">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8218">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8218">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8219">A função Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8219">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8220">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_nz_terms for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8220">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8221">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8221">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8222">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8223">A função Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8223">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8224">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8238">Número de assistência social da Nova Zelândia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8238">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8239">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8240">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8241">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8242">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8243">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8244">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8245">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8246">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8246">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8247">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8248">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8248">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8249">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8249">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8250">um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8250">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8251">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8251">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8252">um hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8252">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8253">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8253">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8254">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8255">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8256">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8257">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8257">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8258">A função Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8258">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8259">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8259">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8260">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8261">A função Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8261">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8269">Número de identificação da Noruega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8269">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8270">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8271">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8271">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8272">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8273">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8273">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8274">seis dígitos no formato DDMMYY que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8274">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8275">número individual de três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8275">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8276">dois dígitos de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8276">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8277">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8278">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8279">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8280">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8281">A função Func_norway_id_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8281">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8282">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_norway_id_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8282">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8283">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8284">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8285">A função Func_norway_id_numbe localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8285">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8286">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8290">Número de Identificação Norueguês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8290">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8291">Número de Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8291">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8292">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8292">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8295">Número de identificação multiuso unificado das Filipinas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8295">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8296">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8297">12 dígitos separados por hifens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8297">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8298">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8299">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8299">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8300">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8300">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8301">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8301">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8302">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8302">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8303">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8304">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8304">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8305">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8306">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8307">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8308">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8309">A expressão regular Regex_philippines_unified_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8309">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8310">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_philippines_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8310">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8317">Número de carteira de motorista polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8317">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8318">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8319">14 dígitos contendo 2 barras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8319">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8320">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8321">14 dígitos e 2 barras para frente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8321">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8322">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8322">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8323">uma barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8324">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8324">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8325">uma barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8325">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8326">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8327">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8328">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8328">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8329">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8330">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8331">A expressão regular  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8331">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8332">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8456">Cartão de identidade polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8456">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8457">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8458">três letras e seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8458">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8459">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8460">três letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8460">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8461">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8462">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8463">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8464">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8465">A função Func_polish_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8465">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8466">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8466">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8467">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8478">ID nacional polônia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8478">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8479">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8480">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8480">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8481">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8481">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8482">6 dígitos que representam a data de nascimento no formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8482">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8483">4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8483">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8484">1 dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8484">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8485">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8486">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8486">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8487">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8488">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8489">A função Func_pesel_identification_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8489">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8490">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_pesel_identification_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8490">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8491">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8491">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8492">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8493">A função Func_pesel_identification_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8494">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8494">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8506">Número de passaporte polonês</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8506">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8507">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação sensível ao Número de Passaporte da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais independente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8507">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8508">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8509">duas letras e sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8509">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8510">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8511">Duas letras (não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas) seguidas de sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8511">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8512">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8513">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8513">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8514">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8515">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8516">A função Func_polish_passport_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8516">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8517">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8517">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8518">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8540">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8541">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8542">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8543">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8544">A função Func_polish_regon_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8544">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8545">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_polish_regon_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8545">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8546">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8546">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8547">A função Func_polish_regon_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8547">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8564">Número de identificação fiscal da Polônia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8564">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8565">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8565">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8566">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8566">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8568">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8568">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8569">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8569">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8570">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8570">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8571">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8571">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8573">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8574">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8574">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8575">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8576">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8576">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8577">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8578">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8578">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8579">A função  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8579">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8580">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8580">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8610">Número do cartão de cidadão de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8610">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8611">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8612">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8613">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8614">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8615">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8616">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8617">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8618">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8619">A expressão regular Regex_portugal_citizen_card localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8619">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8640">Número de carteira de motorista de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8640">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8641">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8642">dois padrões - duas letras seguidas de 5 a 8 dígitos com caracteres especiais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8642">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8643">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8644">Padrão 1: duas letras seguidas de 5/6 com caracteres especiais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8644">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8645">Duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8645">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8646">Um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8646">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8647">Cinco ou seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8647">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8648">Um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8648">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8649">Um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8649">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8650">Padrão 2: uma letra seguida de 6/8 dígitos com caracteres especiais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8650">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8651">Uma letra (não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8651">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8652">Um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8652">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8653">Seis ou oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8653">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8654">Um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8654">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8655">Um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8655">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8656">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8657">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8658">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8659">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8660">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8660">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8661">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8793">Número de passaporte de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8793">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8794">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8795">uma letra seguida por seis dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8796">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8797">uma letra seguida por seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8798">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8799">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8800">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8801">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8802">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8803">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8803">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8804">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8805">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8806">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8806">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8807">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8808">A expressão regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8809">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8836">Número de identificação fiscal de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8836">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8837">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8838">nove dígitos com espaços opcionais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8838">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8839">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8840">3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8840">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8841">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8841">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8842">3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8842">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8843">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8843">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8844">3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8844">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8845">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8846">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8846">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8847">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8848">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8849">A função  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8849">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8850">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8850">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8851">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8851">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8852">A função  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8852">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8877">Número de carteira de motorista da Romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8877">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8878">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8879">um caractere seguido por oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8879">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8880">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8881">um caractere seguido por oito dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8881">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8882">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas) ou dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8882">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8883">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8883">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8884">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8885">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8886">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8887">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8888">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8888">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-8889">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9017">Código numérico pessoal (CNP) da Romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9017">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9018">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9018">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9019">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9019">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9020">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9020">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9021">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9021">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9022">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9022">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9023">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9023">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9024">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9025">13 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9025">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9026">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9026">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9027">1 dígito de 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9027">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9028">6 dígitos que representam a data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9028">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9029">2 dígitos que podem ser 01-52 ou 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9029">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9030">4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9030">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9031">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9032">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9033">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9034">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9034">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9035">A função  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9035">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9036">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9036">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9037">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9037">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9038">A função  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9038">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9089">Número de passaporte romênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9089">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9090">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9091">oito ou nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9091">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9092">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9093">oito ou nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9093">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9094">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9095">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9096">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9097">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9098">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9098">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9099">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9099">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9100">A expressão regular localiza a data no formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (Exemplo- 01 FEB/FEB 10) ou uma palavra-chave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date` onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9100">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9101">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9101">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9102">A expressão regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9103">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9104">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9104">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9105">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9105">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9106">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9106">passport#</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9196">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9197">dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9197">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9200">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9200">Checksum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9205">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9205">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml

    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9214">nove letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9214">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9215">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9216">nove letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9216">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9217">a letra "F", "G", "S" ou "T" (não faz parte do caso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9217">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9218">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9218">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9219">um dígito de verificação alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9219">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9220">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9221">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9221">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9222">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9223">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9223">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9224">A expressão regular Regex_singapore_nric localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9224">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9225">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_singapore_nric for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9225">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9226">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9227">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9228">A expressão regular Regex_singapore_nric localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9229">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9229">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9232">Número do Cartão de Identidade do Registro Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9232">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9233">Número do Cartão de Identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9233">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9234">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9234">NRIC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9237">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9237">FIN</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9240">Número de carteira de motorista da Eslováquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9240">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9241">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9242">um caractere seguido por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9242">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9243">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9244">um caractere seguido por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9244">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9245">uma letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas) ou dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9245">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9246">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9246">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9247">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9248">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9249">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9250">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9251">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9251">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9252">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
