## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9378">Número pessoal da Eslováquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9378">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9379">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9379">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9380">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9380">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9381">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9381">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9382">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9382">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9383">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9383">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9384">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9384">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9385">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9386">nove ou dez dígitos contendo uma invertida opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9386">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9387">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9387">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9388">6 dígitos que representam a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9388">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9389">barra opcional (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9389">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9390">3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9390">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9391">1 dígito de verificação opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9391">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9392">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9393">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9393">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9394">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9395">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9395">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9396">A função  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9396">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9397">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9397">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9398">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9398">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9399">A função  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9399">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9446">Número de passaporte eslováquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9446">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9447">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9448">um dígito ou letra seguido por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9448">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9449">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9450">um dígito ou letra (não sensível a letras minúsculas) seguida por sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9450">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9451">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9452">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9453">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9454">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9455">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9455">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9456">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9456">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9457">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9457">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9458">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9459">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9459">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9460">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9460">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9482">Número de carteira de motorista da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9482">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9483">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9484">nove dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9484">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9485">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9486">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9486">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9487">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9488">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9489">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9490">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9491">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9491">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9492">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9492">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9619">Número de cidadão mestre exclusivo da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9619">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9620">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9620">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9621">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9621">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9622">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9622">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9623">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9623">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9624">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9624">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9625">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9625">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9626">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9627">13 dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9627">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9628">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9629">13 dígitos no padrão especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9629">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9630">sete dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (DDMMLLL), onde "LLL" corresponde aos últimos três dígitos do ano de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9630">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9631">dois dígitos que correspondem à área de nascimento "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9631">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9632">três dígitos que correspondem a uma combinação de sexo e número de série para as pessoas que casam no mesmo dia (000-499 para adulto e 500-999 para mulheres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9632">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9633">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9633">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9634">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9635">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9635">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9636">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9637">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9638">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9638">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9639">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9639">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9640">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9640">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9641">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9641">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9669">Número de passaporte eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9669">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9670">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9671">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9671">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9672">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9673">duas letras seguidas por sete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9673">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9674">a letra "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9674">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9675">uma letra maiúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9675">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9676">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9676">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9677">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9678">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9678">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9679">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9680">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9681">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9681">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9682">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9682">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9683">A expressão regular `Regex_eu_passport_date1` localiza a data no formato DD.MM.AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9683">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9684">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9685">A expressão regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9685">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9686">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9709">Número de identificação fiscal da Eslovênia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9709">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9710">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9711">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9712">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9713">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9714">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9715">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9716">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9717">oito dígitos sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9717">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9718">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9718">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9719">um dígito de 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9719">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9720">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9720">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9721">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9721">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9722">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9723">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9723">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9724">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9725">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9725">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9726">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9726">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9727">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9727">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9728">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9728">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9729">A função  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9729">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9753">Número de identificação da África do Sul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9753">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9754">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9755">13 dígitos que podem conter espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9755">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9756">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9757">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9757">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9758">seis dígitos no formato AAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9758">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9759">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9759">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9760">um indicador de cidadania de dígito único</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9760">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9761">o dígito "8" ou "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9761">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9762">um dígito que é um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9762">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9763">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9764">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9765">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9766">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9767">A função Func_south_africa_identification_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9767">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9768">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_south_africa_identification_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9768">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9769">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9770">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9770">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9775">Número de registro de residente da Coreia do Sul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9775">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9776">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9777">13 dígitos que contém um hifen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9777">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9778">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9779">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9779">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9780">seis dígitos no formato AAMMDD que são a data de nascimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9780">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9781">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9781">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9782">um dígito determinado pelo mundo e gênero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9782">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9783">código de região de nascimento de quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9783">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9784">um dígito usado para diferenciar as pessoas para as quais os números anteriores são idênticos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9784">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9785">um dígito de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9785">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9786">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9787">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9788">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9789">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9790">A função Func_south_korea_resident_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9790">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9791">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9791">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9792">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9793">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9794">A função Func_south_korea_resident_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9794">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9795">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9796">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9796">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9799">Número de Registro do Cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9799">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9803">Número de carteira de motorista da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9803">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9804">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9805">oito dígitos seguidos por um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9805">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9806">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9807">oito dígitos seguidos por um caractere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9807">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9808">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9808">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9809">um dígito ou letra (não sensitivo para letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9809">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9810">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9811">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9812">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9813">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9814">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9814">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9815">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9815">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9816">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9817">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9817">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9951">DNI da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9951">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9952">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9953">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9954">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9955">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9956">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9957">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9958">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9959">oito dígitos seguidos por um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9959">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9960">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9961">sete dígitos seguidos por um caractere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9961">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9962">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9962">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9963">Um espaço ou hífen opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9963">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9964">uma letra de verificação (não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9964">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9965">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9966">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9966">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9967">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9968">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9968">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9969">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9969">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9970">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9970">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9971">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9972">A função  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9972">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9995">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9995">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9996">Número de passaporte da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9996">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9997">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9998">uma combinação de oito ou nove caracteres de letras e números sem espaços ou delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9998">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-9999">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10000">uma combinação de oito ou nove caracteres de letras e números:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10000">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10001">dois dígitos ou letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10001">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10002">um dígito ou letra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10002">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10003">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10003">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10004">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10005">Não aplicável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10005">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10006">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10007">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10008">A expressão regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10008">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10009">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10010">A expressão regular `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` localiza a data no formato DD-MM-AAAA ou uma palavra-chave de onde foi `Keywords_eu_passport_date` encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10010">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10011">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10012">A expressão regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10012">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10013">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10014">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10014">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10042">Número de seguro social da Espanha (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10042">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10043">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10044">11 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10044">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10045">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10046">11 a 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10046">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10047">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10047">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10048">uma barra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10048">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10049">sete a oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10049">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10050">uma barra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10050">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10051">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10051">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10052">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10053">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10053">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10054">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10055">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10055">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10056">A função Func_spanish_social_security_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10056">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10057">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10057">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10058">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10058">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10059">Nenhum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10059">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10060">Número de identificação de imposto da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10060">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10061">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10061">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10062">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10062">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10063">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10063">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10064">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10064">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10065">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10065">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10066">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10066">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10067">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10068">sete ou oito dígitos e uma ou duas letras no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10068">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10069">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10070">Pessoas naturais da Espanha com um Cartão de Identidade Nacional da Espanha:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10070">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10071">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10071">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10072">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10072">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10073">Residentes sem um Cartão de Identidade Nacional da Espanha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10073">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10074">uma letra maiúscula "L" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10074">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10075">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10075">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10076">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10076">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10077">Residentes com menos de 14 anos sem um Cartão de Identidade Nacional da Espanha:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10077">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10078">uma letra maiúscula "K" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10078">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10079">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10079">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10080">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10081">Identificações com o número de identificação de um estrangeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10081">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10082">uma letra maiúscula que seja "X", "Y" ou "Z" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10082">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10083">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10083">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10084">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10085">Insuidades sem o número de identificação de um estrangeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10085">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10086">uma letra maiúscula que seja "M" (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10086">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10087">sete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10087">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10088">uma letra maiúscula (sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10089">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10090">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10090">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10091">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10092">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10092">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10093">A função  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10093">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10094">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10094">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10095">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10095">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10096">A função  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10096">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10127">Cadeia de conexão do SQL Server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10127">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10128">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10129">A cadeia de caracteres "ID de usuário", "ID de usuário", "uid" ou "UserId" seguida pelos caracteres e cadeias de caracteres descritos no padrão abaixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10129">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10130">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10130">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10131">a cadeia de caracteres "ID de usuário", "ID de usuário", "uid" ou "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10131">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10132">qualquer combinação entre 1 a 200 letras minúsculas ou maiúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiais ou espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10132">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10133">a cadeia de caracteres "Password" ou "pwd" onde "pwd" não é precedida por uma letra minúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10133">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10134">um sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10134">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10135">qualquer caractere que não seja um cifrão ($), símbolo de porcentagem (%), maior que o símbolo (>), símbolo (@), aspas ("), ponto-e-vírgula (;), chave esquerda([) ou colchete esquerdo ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10135">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10136">qualquer combinação de 7 a 128 caracteres que não sejam ponto-e-vírgula (;), barra (/) ou aspas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10136">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10137">um ponto-e-vírgula (;) ou aspas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10137">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10138">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10139">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10139">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10140">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10141">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10142">A expressão regular CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10142">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10143">Uma palavra-chave CEP_GlobalFilter **não for** encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10143">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10144">A expressão regular CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **não encontra** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10144">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10145">A expressão regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **não encontra** conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10145">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10146">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10146">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10147">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10147">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10148">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10148">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10149">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10149">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10150">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10150">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10151">exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10151">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10153">(Observe que, tecnicamente, esse tipo de informação sensível identifica essas palavras-chave usando uma expressão regular, não uma lista de palavras-chave.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10153">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10154">Senha ou pwd seguido por espaços 0-2, um sinal de igual (=), espaços de 0-2 e um asterisco (\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10154">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10155">Senha ou pwd seguido por:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10155">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10156">Sinal de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10156">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10157">Menor que o símbolo (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10157">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10158">Qualquer combinação de 1 a 200 caracteres com letras maiúsculas ou minúsculas, dígitos, um asterisco (\*), hífen (-), sublinhado (_) ou caractere de espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10158">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10159">Maior que o símbolo (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10159">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10160">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10160">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10161">(Observe que, tecnicamente, esse tipo de informação sensível identifica essas palavras-chave usando uma expressão regular, não uma lista de palavras-chave.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10161">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10173">Número de carteira de motorista da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10173">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10174">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10175">dez dígitos contendo um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10175">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10176">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10177">dez dígitos contendo um hífen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10177">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10178">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10178">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10179">um hífen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10179">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10180">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10180">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10181">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10182">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10183">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10184">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10185">A expressão regular  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10185">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10186">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` ou for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
