- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10318">körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10318">körkortsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10319">ID nacional da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10319">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10320">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10320">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10321">dez ou 12 dígitos e um delimiter opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10321">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10322">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10322">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10323">dez ou 12 dígitos e um delimiter opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10323">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10324">dois dígitos (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10324">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10325">Seis dígitos no formato de data AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10325">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10326">dolimidor de "-" ou "+" (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10326">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10327">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10328">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10329">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10329">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10330">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10331">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10331">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10332">A função `Func_swedish_national_identifier` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10332">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10333">Uma palavra-chave `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` de onde foi encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10333">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10334">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10334">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10335">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10336">A função `Func_swedish_national_identifier` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10336">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10337">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10337">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10356">Número de passaporte sueco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10356">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10357">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação sensível ao Número de Passaporte da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais independente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10357">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10358">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10359">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10359">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10360">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10361">oito dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10361">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10362">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10363">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10363">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10364">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10365">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10366">a expressão regular Regex_sweden_passport_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10366">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10367">um dos seguintes é verdadeiro:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10367">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10368">uma palavra-chave Keyword_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10368">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10369">uma palavra-chave Keyword_sweden_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10369">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10400">Número de identificação fiscal da Suécia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10400">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10401">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10401">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10402">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10402">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10403">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10403">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10404">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10404">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10405">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10405">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10406">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10406">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10407">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10408">dez dígitos e um símbolo no padrão especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10408">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10409">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10410">dez dígitos e um símbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10410">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10411">seis dígitos que correspondem à data de nascimento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10411">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10412">um sinal de mais ou sinal de menos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10412">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10413">três dígitos que fazem com que o número de identificação seja exclusivo em que:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10413">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10414">para números emitidos antes de 1990, o sétimo e o oitavo dígito identificam o país/região de nascimento ou pessoas que não têm filhos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10414">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10415">o dígito na nona posição indica sexo por ímpar para o adulto ou até mesmo para a mulher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10415">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10416">um dígito de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10416">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10417">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10418">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10418">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10419">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10420">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10421">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10421">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10422">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10422">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10423">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10424">A função  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10424">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10450">Código SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10450">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10451">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10452">quatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras ou dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10452">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10453">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10454">quatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras ou dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10454">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10455">código bancário de quatro letras (não sensível a letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10455">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10456">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10456">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10457">4 a 28 letras ou dígitos (o número de conta bancária básica (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10457">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10458">um espaço opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10458">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10459">de uma a três letras ou dígitos (restante do BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10459">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10460">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10461">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10462">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10463">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10464">A expressão regular Regex_swift localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10464">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10465">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_swift for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10465">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10502">Número AHV do SSN da Suíça</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10502">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10503">Esse tipo de informação confidenciais só está disponível para uso em:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10504">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10505">políticas de conformidade de comunicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10506">governança de informações</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10507">gerenciamento de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10508">Segurança do aplicativo em nuvem da Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10509">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10510">Número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10511">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10512">Número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10513">três dígitos - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10513">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10514">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10514">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10515">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10515">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10516">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10516">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10517">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10517">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10518">um ponto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10518">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10519">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10519">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10520">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10521">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10521">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10522">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10523">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10523">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10524">A função Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10524">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10525">Uma palavra-chave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10525">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10526">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10526">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10527">A função Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10527">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10528">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10528">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_swiss_ssn_ahv_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10529">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10529">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10548">Número de identificação nacional de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10548">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10549">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10550">uma letra (em inglês) seguida de nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10550">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10551">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10552">uma letra (em inglês) seguida de nove dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10552">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10553">uma letra (em inglês, não sensitivo entre letras minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10553">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10554">o dígito "1" ou "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10554">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10555">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10555">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10556">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10557">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10558">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10559">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10559">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10560">A função Func_taiwanese_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10560">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10561">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_taiwanese_national_id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10561">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10562">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10563">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10563">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10564">A função Func_taiwanese_national_id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10564">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10565">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10582">Número de passaporte de Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10582">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10583">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10583">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10584">número de passaporte biométrico: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10584">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10585">número de passaporte não biométrico: nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10585">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10586">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10586">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10587">número de passaporte biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10587">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10588">o caractere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10588">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10589">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10589">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10590">número de passaporte não biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10590">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10591">nove dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10591">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10592">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10593">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10593">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10594">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10595">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10595">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10596">A expressão regular Regex_taiwan_passport localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10596">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10597">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_taiwan_passport for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10597">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10608">Número do certificado de residente de Taiwan (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10608">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10609">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10610">dez letras e dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10610">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10611">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10612">dez letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10612">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10613">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10613">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10614">oito dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10615">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10616">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10617">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10618">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10619">A expressão regular Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10619">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10620">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10620">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10634">Código de identificação da população tailandesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10634">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10635">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10636">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10636">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10637">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10638">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10638">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10639">o primeiro dígito não é zero ou nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10639">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10640">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10640">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10641">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10642">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10643">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10644">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10644">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10645">A função Func_Thai_Citizen_Id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10645">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10646">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10646">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10647">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10648">A função Func_Thai_Citizen_Id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10648">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10657">Número de identificação nacional turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10657">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10658">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10659">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10659">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10660">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10661">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10661">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10662">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10663">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10663">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10664">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10665">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10666">A função Func_Turkish_National_Id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10666">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10667">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_Turkish_National_Id for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10667">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10668">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10668">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10669">A função Func_Turkish_National_Id localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10669">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10676">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10676">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10677">número de carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10677">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10678">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação sensível ao Número de Carteira de Motorista da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais independente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10678">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10679">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10680">Combinação de 18 letras e dígitos no formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10680">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10681">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10682">18 letras e dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10682">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10683">cinco letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) ou o dígito "9" no lugar de uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10683">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10684">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10684">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10685">cinco dígitos no formato de data MMDAM para a data de nascimento (o 7º caractere é incrementado em 50 se driver for mulher, ou seja, 51 a 62 em vez de 01 a 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10685">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10686">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) ou o dígito "9" no lugar de uma letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10686">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10687">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10687">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10688">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10689">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10690">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10691">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10692">A função Func_uk_drivers_license localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10692">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10693">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10693">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10694">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10712">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10712">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10713">número de rolagem de 1º</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10713">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10714">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10715">duas letras seguidas de 1 a 4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10715">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10716">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10717">duas letras (não sensíveis a maiúsculas e minúsculas) seguidas de números de 1 a 4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10717">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10718">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10719">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10719">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10720">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10721">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10722">A expressão regular Regex_uk_electoral localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10722">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10723">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_electoral for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10723">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10730">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10730">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10731">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10731">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10732">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10733">10 a 17 dígitos separados por espaços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10733">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10734">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10735">10 a 17 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10735">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10736">três ou dez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10736">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10737">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10737">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10738">três dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10738">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10739">um espaço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10739">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10740">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10740">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10741">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10742">Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10742">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10743">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10744">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10745">A função Func_uk_nhs_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10745">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10746">Uma das seguintes opções for verdadeira:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10746">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10747">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10747">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10748">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10748">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10749">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10749">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10750">A soma de verificação passa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10750">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10768">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10768">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10769">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10769">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10770">Essa entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais está incluída no tipo de informação confidenciais número de identificação nacional da UE e está disponível como uma entidade de tipo de informação confidenciais autônomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10770">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10771">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10772">sete caracteres ou nove caracteres separados por espaços ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10772">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10773">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10774">dois padrões possíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10774">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10775">duas letras (os NINOs válidos usam apenas determinados caracteres nesse prefixo, o que esse padrão valida; não faz sentido para maiúsculas e minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10775">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10776">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10776">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10777">'A', 'B', 'C' ou 'D' (como o prefixo, somente determinados caracteres são permitidos no sufixo; não fazem a alteração de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10777">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10778">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10778">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10779">duas letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10779">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10780">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10780">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10781">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10781">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10782">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10782">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10783">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10784">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10784">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10785">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10785">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10786">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10786">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10787">'A', 'B', 'C' ou 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10787">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10788">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10789">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10789">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10790">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10791">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10792">A função Func_uk_nino localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10792">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10793">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_uk_nino for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10793">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10794">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10795">A função Func_uk_nino localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10795">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10817">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10817">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10818">Número de Referência de Contribuinte Exclusivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10818">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10820">políticas de prevenção contra perda de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10825">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10826">10 dígitos sem espaços e delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10826">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10827">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10828">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10828">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10829">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10830">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10830">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10831">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10832">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10832">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10833">A função  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10833">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10834">Uma palavra-chave  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` de onde foi encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10834">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10835">Palavras-chave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10835">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10836">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10836">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10837">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10837">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10854">Número de conta bancária dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10854">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10855">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10856">6 a 17 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10856">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10857">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10858">6 a 17 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10858">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10859">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10859">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10860">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10860">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10861">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10861">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10862">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10862">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10863">A expressão regular Regex_usa_bank_account_number localiza o conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10863">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10864">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_usa_Bank_Account for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10864">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10894">Número de carteira de motorista dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10894">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10895">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10896">Depende do estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10896">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10897">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10898">depende do estado – por exemplo, Nova York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10898">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10899">nove dígitos formatados como ddd ddd ddd corresponderão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10899">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10900">nove dígitos como ddddddd não corresponderão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10900">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10901">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10902">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10903">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10904">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10904">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10905">A função Func_new_york_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10905">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10906">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10906">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10907">Uma palavra-chave Keyword_us_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10907">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10908">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10908">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10909">A função Func_new_york_drivers_license_number localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10909">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10910">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10910">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10911">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10911">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-10912">Nenhuma palavra-chave de Keyword_us_drivers_license for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-10912">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11010">ITIN (número de identificação de contribuinte individual) dos EUA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11010">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11011">Formatar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11012">nove dígitos que começam com um "9" e contêm "7" ou "8" como o quarto dígito, opcionalmente formatado com espaços ou traços</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11012">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11013">Padrão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11014">formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11014">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11015">o dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11015">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11016">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11016">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11017">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11017">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11018">a "7" ou "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11018">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11019">um dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11019">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11020">um espaço ou um traço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11020">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11021">quatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11021">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11022">não formatado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11022">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11023">o dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11023">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11024">dois dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11024">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11025">a "7" ou "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11025">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11026">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11026">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11027">Soma de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11028">Não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11028">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11029">Definição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11030">Uma política de DLP tem 85% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11030">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11031">A função Func_formatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11031">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11032">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11032">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11033">Uma política de DLP tem 75% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11033">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11034">A função Func_unformatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11034">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11035">Uma palavra-chave de Keyword_itin for encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11035">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11036">Uma política de DLP tem 65% de certeza de que ela detectou este tipo de informação confidencial se, dentro de uma proximidade de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11036">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2f1f7-11037">A função Func_formatted_itin ou Func_unformatted_itin localiza conteúdo que corresponde ao padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2f1f7-11037">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
